rules.natural: The study was conducted using a methodology or samples were collected from the field.
Provided that samples were collected from the field, the phenomenon was discovered with evidence.
Under the condition that the condition met the requirement, the substance was tested with a protocol.
Either the condition met the requirement or the criteria satisfied the standard.
If the criteria satisfied the standard, then whenever the study was conducted using a methodology, the phenomenon was discovered with evidence.

Either the invention was patented at the office or, if the substance was tested with a protocol, then under the condition that the study was conducted using a methodology, the phenomenon was discovered with evidence.
Under the condition that researchers collaborated with the institution, the paper was coauthored with a colleague.
Researchers collaborated with the institution or an expert in the field was consulted.
If an expert in the field was consulted, then permission was granted by the authority.
Whenever data were shared in the repository, permission was granted by the authority.
The paper was submitted to the journal or the paper was rejected after review.
Either the technology was licensed to a company or, if the paper was coauthored with a colleague, then data were shared in the repository.
Provided that the grant was awarded by the agency, then either the team was approved for funding or permission was granted by the authority.
Either findings were disclosed to the public or results were presented at the symposium.
Under the condition that results were presented at the symposium, ethics were not violated according to the committee.
Consent was obtained from participants or regulatory guidelines were followed.
If regulatory guidelines were followed, then whenever findings were disclosed to the public, ethics were not violated according to the committee.
Under the condition that the paper was rejected after review, permission was granted by the authority.

If the study was replicated independently, then provided that the substance was tested with a protocol, then if the study was conducted using a methodology, the phenomenon was discovered with evidence.

Provided that the results were confirmed through validation, then under the condition that the substance was tested with a protocol, then if the study was conducted using a methodology, the phenomenon was discovered with evidence.
If equipment was used in the facility, then the study was replicated independently.

If the compound was purified through a process, then it is not the case that the sample was contaminated due to error.
Provided that the material was synthesized with a method, then the sample was not contaminated due to error.
The substance was dissolved in solvent or the mixture was heated to temperature.
Under the condition that the mixture was heated to temperature, the material was synthesized with a method.
Whenever the chemicals reacted under condition, the product was formed from the reaction.
If the chemicals reacted under condition, then the product was not formed from the reaction.
Either the chemicals reacted under condition or, if the substance was dissolved in solvent, then the compound was purified through a process.
Provided that the experiment was completed with results, then if the paper was submitted to the journal, the team was approved for funding.
The experiment was completed with results or the data were analyzed using software.
If the manuscript was accepted by the editor, then it is not the case that data were falsified due to misconduct.
Either the publication was retracted by the journal or, if errors were corrected in the revision, then content was not plagiarized from a source.
Provided that the claim was investigated by the committee, then the publication was not retracted by the journal.
The claim was investigated by the committee or the results were validated through replication.
If the results were validated through replication, then the conclusion was upheld by evidence.
If the conclusion was upheld by evidence, then the publication was not retracted by the journal.
If the data were analyzed using software, then the results were verified through peer review.
Whenever the results were verified through peer review, the findings were published in a conference.
If the findings were published in a conference, then provided that the paper was submitted to the journal, the team was approved for funding.
Access to the lab was authorized or permission was granted by the authority.
If the phenomenon was discovered with evidence, then access to the lab was not authorized.
